sentence.Network_en: Deinonychus lived 110 to 100 million years ago. That time was called the Cretaceous period.
sentence.Network_cn: 恐爪龙生活在1亿~1亿1000万年前, 这个时候叫做白垩纪.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文2007年3月27日 - 恐爪龙属(deinonychus) 长3---4米,高1.8米重75公斤生活在白垩纪时期的美国蒙大拿州,犹他州和怀俄明州。  1964年在美国的蒙大拿州grant e.meyer.

list.abs: ...过去，某些驰龙科的物种有时被归类于伶盗龙属中，例如平衡恐爪龙（deinonychus antirrhopus）（Deinonychus antirrhopus）、蓝斯顿氏蜥鸟盗龙（Saurornitho…

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Greek deinos 'terrible' + onux, onukh- 'claw'

means.word_mean: 1. swift agile wolf-sized bipedal dinosaur having a large curved claw on each hind foot; of the Cretaceous

auth_sentence.content: Isolated injuries have been reported in Camptosaurus, Iguanodon, Deinonychus and Syntarsus.
